results.comment: A nice solution to implement use forms in your Redux application, besides a problem performance: every keystoke causes the application to re-render. That problem should be solved with version 6.

I use it in [bestof.js.org](http://bestof.js.org), it works nicely and has a small footprint.

On mobiles, it is very cool to be able to toggle the side bar by sliding the screen from the edge... it is so smooth!
React と Redux を使います。
